headline: It’s Been a Memorable Quarter for These AI Stocks
summary: DRAM and NAND flash memory play a crucial role in data centers.  Counterpoint Research says prices have jumped 80% to 90% so far in the first quarter.  The flash memory maker Sandisk has nearly tripled in value in the past three months while Micron has surged by 66%.

headline: Latest News In AI Chips - AI Market Expansion Fueled By Technological Advancements
summary: The AI chip market is witnessing significant growth as technology adoption accelerates across multiple sectors. headline: These Stocks Are Today’s Movers: Hims & Hers, Novo Nordisk, Micron, Kroger, STMicroelectronics, Nvidia, and More
summary: Stock futures were falling Monday with investors concerned a relief rally from the end of last week may not have legs.  Hims & Hers Health  sank 16% after the online drug retailer said Saturday it would no longer offer a compounded pill version of  Novo Nordisk  popular weight-loss medicine Wegovy following increased scrutiny from federal regulators.  Novo Nordisk’s American depositary receipts gained 6.4% on Monday.
